title: The Two Ways of Doing
excerpt: Imagine two friends, Steve and Fred, chatting at a New Year’s party. Both of them resolve to abstain from alcohol for January, and attend the gym regularly. They shake on it. They don’t want to let each other down, and they both fulfill their commitments. Afterward, Steve keeps up his routine, and Fred soon drifts back to too much beer

title: How to Be a Stoic
excerpt: Born nearly two thousand years before Darwin and Freud, Epictetus seems to have anticipated a way out of their prisons.
